objects.name: Analytic 0657
objects.description: Phishing attachment detection on macOS through correlation of Mail app logs, file creation in user directories, and abnormal process execution (e.g., Preview.app or Mail.app spawning Terminal or scripting binaries). Network traffic after attachment interaction is also monitored.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Inbound messages with attachments from suspicious domains

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Execution of Terminal, osascript, or other interpreters originating from Mail or Preview

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Attachment files written to ~/Downloads or temporary folders

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Time delay between attachment download and execution considered suspicious.
Parent processes expected to rarely spawn child processes (e.g., Mail.app, Preview.app).
